n0:createOracleTrigger.n0:source: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TRIGGER "HR"."UPDATE_JOB_HISTORY" AFTER UPDATE OF job_id, department_id ON employees FOR EACH ROW BEGIN add_job_history(:old.employee_id, :old.hire_date, sysdate, :old.job_id, :old.department_id); END; / ALTER TRIGGER "HR"."UPDATE_JOB_HISTORY" ENABLE
